content.rendered:
One container of Body Fortress Vanilla Super Advanced Whey Protein Powder Scientifically advanced blend of protein powder contains 60 grams of protein and delivers 12 grams of BCAA’s per two scoops
Vanilla protein shake powder contains amino acids plus Creatine for improved training recovery (1)
Body Fortress Protein Powder contains zero aspartame and is gluten-free.

Vanilla protein drinks are ideal for pre and post-workout, or as needed throughout the day in order to meet your daily protein requirements.

SIZE : 907 G
